title: How do I book a session?
description: Booking with Queenlens Photography is simple! You can use our Contact Us page to send us an inquiry or book directly through our Booking Form. Once we receive your information, we’ll get in touch to discuss your vision, confirm availability, and guide you through the next steps.

title: Do you travel for events and photoshoots?
description: Yes, we do! We love capturing moments in new locations and are happy to travel. However, travel fees may apply depending on the location of your event. Contact us for more details on travel availability and rates.

title: Can I customize my package?
description: Absolutely! We understand that every client has unique needs. Feel free to let us know your specific requests, and we’ll work to create a package that fits your vision and budget. Customizations may include extended hours, additional editing, or print products.

title: Do you provide prints and albums?
description: Yes! In addition to digital files, we offer beautiful custom-designed photo albums, framed prints, and other printed products. We believe these keepsakes make your photos even more special. Let us know if you’d like to include these in your package.

title: What happens if the weather is bad on the day of the shoot?
description: We know that weather can be unpredictable! If it looks like rain or other bad weather on your shoot day, we can discuss rescheduling or adjusting our plans. Our goal is to ensure you get beautiful, high-quality images regardless of the circumstances.
